verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:12
verses.text: And when thy days be fulfilled, and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers, I will set up thy seed after thee, which shall proceed out of thy bowels, and I will establish his kingdom.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:13
verses.text: He shall build an house for my name, and I will stablish the throne of his kingdom for ever.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:14
verses.text: I will be his father, and he shall be my son. If he commit iniquity, I will chasten him with the rod of men, and with the stripes of the children of men:
